title: TPG outage?
body:
I can patch, but i cant log in.
i tried restarting everything, and i can still connect to everything else. I changed to dns 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4, and ran a tracert.

C:\Users\User>tracert 103.240.227.5

Tracing route to 103.240.227.5 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  192.168.1.1
  2    17 ms    16 ms    32 ms  10.20.23.121
  3    17 ms    16 ms    16 ms  203-219-166-66.static.tpgi.com.au [203.219.166.6
6]
  4    37 ms    31 ms    31 ms  203-221-3-69.tpgi.com.au [203.221.3.69]
  5    48 ms    32 ms    31 ms  203-219-106-254.tpgi.com.au [203.219.106.254]
  6     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  9     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 10     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 11     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 12     *        *     ^C
C:\Users\User>tracert 103.240.227.25

Tracing route to 103.240.227.25 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  192.168.1.1
  2    16 ms    16 ms    17 ms  10.20.23.121
  3    20 ms    16 ms    16 ms  203-219-166-2.static.tpgi.com.au [203.219.166.2]

  4    35 ms    31 ms    31 ms  203-221-3-5.tpgi.com.au [203.221.3.5]
  5    30 ms    34 ms    31 ms  203-219-106-254.tpgi.com.au [203.219.106.254]
  6     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  9     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 10     *

I'm in brisbane and [the last working hop was on 203.219.106.254 which is in sydney. ](http://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=203.219.106.254) anything I can do?

EDIT: I tried sending a support ticket but I cant even log into the https://auth.riotgames.com/authorize page.

replies.body: Yeah I'm having similar issues. I logged out and tried to log back in again and I got an endless "logging into server..."
Well i logged in and everything seems fine right now

Yeah same sometimes i can log in sometimes i can't. When i can login it connects to chat really slow and i can't even queue for a ranked game because it says i need to be level 30 and have 16 champions. Feelsbadman {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
